alert.note: Alert for East Feliciana; St. Helena; St. Tammany; Tangipahoa; Washington; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 15 at 2:31PM CDT until June 15 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 304 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 5 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN LOUISIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 PARISHES IN SOUTHEAST LOUISIANA EAST FELICIANA ST. HELENA ST. TAMMANY TANGIPAHOA WASHINGTON WEST FELICIANA IN MISSISSIPPI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN SOUTHERN MISSISSIPPI AMITE HANCOCK HARRISON JACKSON PEARL RIVER PIKE WALTHALL WILKINSON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMITE, BAY ST. LOUIS, BOGALUSA, CENTREVILLE, CLINTON, COVINGTON, CROSSROADS, DARLINGTON, DEXTER, DIAMONDHEAD, DOLOROSA, EASLEYVILLE, ENON, FELPS, FORT ADAMS, FRANKLINTON, GAUTIER, GILLSBURG, GLOSTER, GREENSBURG, GULFPORT, HAMMOND, JACKSON, LACOMBE, LIBERTY, MANDEVILLE, MCCOMB, MCNEIL, MONTPELIER, MOSS POINT, OCEAN SPRINGS, PASCAGOULA, PICAYUNE, PONCHATOULA, ROBERT, SALEM, SLIDELL, SMITHDALE, SPILLMAN, ST. FRANCISVILLE, ST. MARTIN, TYLERTOWN, WAKEFIELD, WAVELAND, AND WOODVILLE.

area.areaDesc: East Feliciana; St. Helena; St. Tammany; Tangipahoa; Washington; West Feliciana
